Name: Whack A Hoe
About the game: Go the distance ! In this fun shooter game you aren't shooting bullets, NO! You're shooting Dildo's of all shapes, sizes and from the character that you choose! The object of the game is to be the leader with the highest score. Perfect your angle, wait for the power meter to get to the top (full) and WHACK AWAY. As the Dildo magically shoots from your female characters beaver, while on it's travel to the deepest parts of the ocean if it happens to hit a boat you'll get extra points added to your score. Don't forget that the further you shoot your Dildo the more points you receive.
